project.name: Optimist Farm Storybook Series
project.description: AI-powered children's storybook illustration generator based on Writing Bible v2.4

default.name: Saturated Rainbow (Writing Bible v2.4)
default.prompt: Saturated, rainbow-forward color palette, bright optimistic feel, high contrast for accessibility, 3D animated children's storybook illustration, expressive cartoon eyes, soft lighting, whimsical farm setting, professional children's book quality, digital-first design

pixar.name: Pixar-Quality 3D
pixar.prompt: Pixar-quality 3D animated rendering, soft fur textures, expressive cartoon eyes, warm natural lighting, shallow depth of field, whimsical farm setting, high detail, professional children's book quality

watercolor.name: Soft Watercolor
watercolor.prompt: Gentle watercolor illustration style, soft edges, muted earthy tones, nostalgic and warm, hand-painted texture, children's storybook quality, Beatrix Potter inspired

cartoon.name: Vibrant Cartoon
cartoon.prompt: Cartoon style, bright sunny colors, clean lines, expressive characters, children's animation quality, vibrant and cheerful, consistent with established character designs

ollie_owl.name: Ollie the Owl
ollie_owl.description: Wise owl with bright round spectacles perched on his beak, soft brown and cream feathers, large knowing eyes behind glasses, calm and gentle expression, slightly ruffled feathers suggesting wisdom and age
ollie_owl.personality: Wise mentor figure, delivers guidance with gentle wisdom, his appearance is accompanied by a soft chime
ollie_owl.visual_cues: bright spectacles, soft brown feathers, wise gentle eyes

barnaby_bunny.name: Barnaby Bunny
barnaby_bunny.description: Gray and white bunny wearing blue denim overalls with a plaid shirt underneath, large expressive dark eyes, long upright ears with pink interior, soft fluffy fur, friendly and curious expression
barnaby_bunny.personality: Curious, adventurous, natural leader, grateful heart
barnaby_bunny.visual_cues: blue denim overalls, plaid shirt, gray and white fur, pink inner ears

pearl_pig.name: Pearl the Pig
pearl_pig.description: Pink pig with a curly tail, wearing a sunflower tucked behind one ear, round snout with a cheerful smile, bright expressive eyes, clean and well-groomed appearance
pearl_pig.personality: Determined, hardworking, loves trying new things, never gives up
pearl_pig.visual_cues: pink, sunflower behind ear, curly tail, cheerful smile

gus_goat.name: Gus the Goat
gus_goat.description: Tan colored goat with small spiral horns, white fluffy beard, playful mischievous expression, walking upright on hind legs, expressive eyes with a twinkle of fun
gus_goat.personality: Mischievous but kind, learning self-control, enthusiastic, loves to help with big tasks
gus_goat.visual_cues: tan fur, spiral horns, white beard, mischievous twinkle

christy_cow.name: Christy the Cow
christy_cow.description: Black and white spotted Holstein calf, pink nose, small budding horns, warm brown eyes, cheerful dancing expression, gentle and nurturing appearance
christy_cow.personality: Happy, optimistic, loves to dance, kind and forgiving
christy_cow.visual_cues: black and white spots, pink nose, warm brown eyes, gentle smile

lillie_lamb.name: Lillie the Lamb
lillie_lamb.description: Fluffy white lamb with a soft woolly coat, black face and legs, gentle doe eyes, small pink nose, wearing a tiny bell on a ribbon around neck, serene and peaceful expression
lillie_lamb.personality: Gentle, patient, gives the softest hugs, compassionate soul
lillie_lamb.visual_cues: white wool, black face and legs, bell on ribbon, gentle eyes

dugan_dog.name: Dugan the Dog
dugan_dog.description: Friendly farm dog with golden-brown fur, floppy ears, loyal trusting eyes, wagging tail, red bandana around neck, alert but calm posture
dugan_dog.personality: Loyal, trustworthy, calm presence, teaches respect through gentle approach
dugan_dog.visual_cues: golden-brown fur, floppy ears, red bandana, wagging tail

clementine_chick.name: Clementine the Chick
clementine_chick.description: Fluffy yellow chick with bright orange beak and feet, tiny wings, big curious eyes, energetic and bouncy appearance, small red comb beginning to show
clementine_chick.personality: Honest, straightforward, energetic, always tells the truth
clementine_chick.visual_cues: fluffy yellow, orange beak and feet, tiny wings, curious eyes

delilah_duck.name: Delilah the Duck
delilah_duck.description: White duck with bright orange bill and webbed feet, smooth white feathers, kind motherly eyes, graceful waddle, slightly larger than Dixie
delilah_duck.personality: Responsible, generous coach, teaches younger ones, dependable
delilah_duck.visual_cues: white feathers, orange bill and feet, kind motherly expression

dixie_duckling.name: Dixie the Duckling
dixie_duckling.description: Small fluffy yellow duckling with tiny orange bill, soft downy feathers, big brave eyes despite small size, often near water or lily pads
dixie_duckling.personality: Brave despite being small, learning courage, takes on new challenges
dixie_duckling.visual_cues: small yellow, fluffy down, tiny orange bill, brave expression

lil_dax_donkey.name: Lil Dax the Donkey
lil_dax_donkey.description: Young gray donkey with long ears, wearing a small brown derby hat, sturdy build for his age, helpful eager expression, soft fuzzy coat
lil_dax_donkey.personality: Helpful, hardworking, eager to assist, never complains about heavy loads
lil_dax_donkey.visual_cues: gray fur, long ears, brown derby hat, sturdy build

posie_piglet.name: Posie the Piglet
posie_piglet.description: Small pink piglet, younger and smaller than Pearl, muddy but happy, bright curious eyes, tiny curly tail, loves to play
posie_piglet.personality: Playful, friendly, loves mud puddles, makes friends easily
posie_piglet.visual_cues: small pink, sometimes muddy, tiny curly tail, playful expression

snip_squirrel.name: Snip the Squirrel
snip_squirrel.description: Reddish-brown squirrel with bushy tail, quick movements, often holding an acorn, bright alert eyes, fluffy ears with small tufts
snip_squirrel.personality: Quick, generous with sharing, values friendship, loves collecting but shares freely
snip_squirrel.visual_cues: reddish-brown, bushy tail, often with acorn, alert eyes

millie_mouse.name: Millie the Mouse
millie_mouse.description: Tiny gray mouse with large round ears, long thin tail, pink nose, wearing a tiny apron, small but observant, gentle demeanor
millie_mouse.personality: Empathetic, notices when others are sad, honest and caring
millie_mouse.visual_cues: tiny gray, large round ears, pink nose, tiny apron

hollis_horse.name: Hollis the Horse
hollis_horse.description: Strong brown horse with white blaze on face, flowing dark mane and tail, kind wise eyes, muscular but gentle build, calm steady presence
hollis_horse.personality: Strong, reliable, optimistic, sees the good in every situation
hollis_horse.visual_cues: brown coat, white face blaze, flowing mane, kind eyes

ralphie_rooster.name: Ralphie the Rooster
ralphie_rooster.description: Colorful rooster with bright red comb and wattle, iridescent green and gold tail feathers, proud upright stance, cheerful wake-up expression
ralphie_rooster.personality: Early riser, fair and just, announces each morning, ensures everyone gets equal share
ralphie_rooster.visual_cues: red comb, green and gold tail feathers, proud stance

pippin_snail.name: Pippin the Snail
pippin_snail.description: Small cheerful snail with a colorful spiral shell in warm rainbow colors, tiny antenna with dots on tips, friendly smile, leaves a subtle sparkly trail
pippin_snail.personality: Hidden friend on every page, cheerful when found, rewards seekers with a smile
pippin_snail.visual_cues: colorful spiral shell, tiny antenna, friendly smile, sparkly trail
pippin_snail.special_function: Appears visually hidden on every page as a seek-and-find element. Tap triggers cheerful 'Pippin smile' sound.

garden.name: The Garden
garden.description: Lush vegetable garden with rows of carrots, lettuce, and tomatoes, rich dark soil, morning dew on leaves, warm sunlight, wooden fence border

barn.name: The Red Barn
barn.description: Classic red barn with weathered wood siding, large doors, hay loft visible, tools on neat pegboard, warm golden light inside, cozy and safe

windmill.name: The Windmill / Breezy Meadow
windmill.description: Old wooden windmill on a gentle hill, ribbons and kites flying in the breeze, tall grass swaying, blue sky with fluffy clouds

meadow_of_kindness.name: Meadow of Kindness
meadow_of_kindness.description: Open meadow filled with wildflowers and soft grass, butterflies floating, warm sunshine, perfect for mood-turn scenes and reconciliation

meadow_edge.name: Meadow Edge / Quiet Space
meadow_edge.description: Peaceful edge of the meadow near the forest, quiet and serene, soft blanket on grass, perfect for calm reflection and trust-building

pond.name: The Duck Pond
pond.description: Calm pond with lily pads and cattails, reflections on water, gentle ripples, safe shallow edges, willow tree nearby

oak_tree.name: The Great Oak / Starry Night
oak_tree.description: Magnificent old oak tree with sprawling branches, perfect for climbing, acorns scattered below, night scenes show stars through leaves

chicken_coop.name: The Chicken Coop
chicken_coop.description: Cozy chicken coop with nesting boxes, straw bedding, wooden perches, tally sticks for counting, warm morning light

farmhouse_kitchen.name: Farmhouse Kitchen
farmhouse_kitchen.description: Warm farmhouse kitchen with hearth, wooden table, copper pots, fresh baked goods smell, cozy and inviting

seed_trays.name: Seed Trays / Sun Patch
seed_trays.description: Wooden seed trays in a sunny spot, small sprouts emerging, gentle warmth, patience visible in slow growth

micro_ritual.name: A Kind Squeeze
micro_ritual.description: Give a gentle hand squeeze to someone

micro_ritual.name: Hands on Heart, Count to Three
micro_ritual.description: Place hands on heart and count to three before acting

micro_ritual.name: Find a Friend to Share
micro_ritual.description: Find something to share with a friend today

micro_ritual.name: Invite One Friend In
micro_ritual.description: Invite a friend to join your activity

micro_ritual.name: Ask How Can I Help
micro_ritual.description: Ask someone 'How can I help?' today

micro_ritual.name: One Two Three Pull
micro_ritual.description: Work together counting 'One, two, three... PULL!'

micro_ritual.name: One Pushes One Pulls
micro_ritual.description: Work with a partner - one pushes, one pulls

micro_ritual.name: A Mistake Hug
micro_ritual.description: Give a forgiving hug after a mistake

micro_ritual.name: Find the Good
micro_ritual.description: Name one good thing about a hard situation

micro_ritual.name: One Scoop Each
micro_ritual.description: Divide treats equally - one scoop for each person

micro_ritual.name: Close Eyes and Listen
micro_ritual.description: Close your eyes and trust someone to guide you by sound

micro_ritual.name: Soft Voice Gentle Hands
micro_ritual.description: Use a soft voice and gentle hands with someone small

story_engine.description: Six-Beat Arc structure for all stories (20-24 screens)

setup.description: Friend + Place + Aim (2 short rhythmic lines, one sense word)

mentor_light.description: Ollie (or peer) whispers <=18-word line; soft chime; tiny visual glow

practice_growth.description: Two mini-tries; one visible tweak each; gentle self-talk

climax_win.description: Small, vivid success (carrots pop; kite lifts; tower holds)

resolution.description: Meadow cheer or starry quiet + Final Affirmation question inviting action today

prompt_templates.hero_shot: Single character portrait of {character_name}: {character_description}. Standing in a neutral pose facing slightly toward camera, full body visible, {style_prompt}. Clean background with subtle {location} elements. Character should be clearly identifiable for reference purposes.
prompt_templates.group_shot: Group scene with {character_list}: {character_descriptions}. Characters standing together in a friendly pose, all clearly visible, {style_prompt}. Background setting: {location_description}. All characters should be clearly identifiable and consistent with their individual designs.
prompt_templates.scene: Scene depicting: {scene_description}. Characters present: {character_list}. {style_prompt}. Setting: {location_description}. Maintain exact character appearances from reference images. {additional_notes}
prompt_templates.cover: Book cover illustration for '{book_title}' - a children's storybook about {virtue}. Featured character: {featured_character_name} ({featured_character_description}). {style_prompt}. Dynamic, eye-catching composition suitable for a book cover. Title space at top. Setting hints: {location_description}.
prompt_templates.consistency_suffix: Maintain: exact same character appearance, clothing, fur texture, eye style, proportions from reference image.
